title: How do I disconnect LoL account on mobile?
body: Last week, I got my account hacked and I managed to log back into my account. I've noticed the hacker linked his/her mobile to my account, and continues to send message/spam to my friend list... How do I unlink mobile from my LoL account? Please help...

replies.body: I'm gonna try something on our end to see if this forces them to be logged out. Let me know if you believe this worked please!
The mobile sign appeared back again... I've changed my password twice already, what should I do?
Okay so I asked my friend just now, and she told me the little mobile sign next to my icon is gone now. Hopefully it is fixed... thanks for the help. If it comes back, I will let you know
